page.title: 15INDUSTRY IN BARLBY
page.content: Rank-Hovis is a flour mill with 7 floors and a silo where wheat is received.They have a warehouse which stores pallets and other things. They have laboratory where tests are carried out.They have a garage for servicing,cleaning and painting of all tankers.They also have a weigh-bridge where lorries are checked in and out. B.O.C.M is a factory in which cattle food is made.Much of the raw material is brought by boat.They fill the lorries with the food and take it to the farms. Hazelwoods is a pickle and sauce mill. Round the back of the factory are hundreds of big buckets of sauce and pickles.
